name: Iced Ginger Lemonade
preparation: Fill pitcher with chilled tea. Slice lemons in half and squeeze juice into pitcher. Stir in maple syrup.
Pour over ice into four glasses. Garnish with toppings, if desired.
tips: Top with club soda for a carbonated beverage.

products.name: Ginger Mule Herbal Tea Blend
summary: Indulge in a delicious Ginger Mule Herbal Tea, with the same kick of ginger, sweet tang of lime, and refreshing mint as the classic cocktail but without the alcohol. Steep in hot water for 5-7 minutes to enjoy a revitalizing brew or chill for a caffeine-free iced tea. This tea is ideal for any occasion—from lazy Sunday mornings to an after-dinner drink—with digestion relief from ginger and calming properties of mint.
